title: Introducing: Surma
body: Newly signed to Portugal based label Omnichord Record, Deborah Umbelino aka **Surma** has just released her debut offering, _Maasai_. An exquisitely beautiful first track, it’s truly an otherworldly journey – through a shimmer guitar line, and Umbelino’s Bjork-esque vocals – there’s elements of Portishead and Daughter thrown in for good measure. Check it out below, this demands repeat listens. Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly. Maasai by Surma
